Personal Injury Law Firm Broken Arrow, OK

The Romano Law Firm is a comprehensive personal injury law firm in Broken Arrow. Our attorneys are 100% committed to getting fair compensation for victims of personal injury in Broken Arrow. When you or someone you know is injured by someone else, you have the right to financial compensation for any medical expenses, income lost as a result of that injury, and any other miscellaneous damages that resulted from the injury. Our attorneys are experienced with a wide variety of personal injury cases and consistently get more compensation for victims than they would have received without legal representation.


We know how intimidating it can be to take on a big insurance company by yourself. We can stand up to the big insurance companies for you so that you don’t have to worry about being taken advantage of. Your voice will always be heard, and as a result, you can get back on your feet with the financial relief you are entitled to.

Choosing a Personal Injury Law Firm in Broken Arrow

Choosing a Broken Arrow personal injury law firm can be difficult, especially when you are presented with more information than you know what to do with. Yet, hiring the right law firm to represent you can make a big difference in whether or not you receive justice. Because we have the passion of a small firm with the resources of a large firm, you’ll never fall through the cracks. We understand that your case is unique, and we will treat it as such. Our Broken Arrow personal injury attorneys always take the time necessary to get to know you and your case before moving forward, and we have expert Tulsa auto accident lawyers on staff.


In addition to our attorneys, we have a team of medical and legal experts who will document your injuries at the same time while simultaneously guiding you towards recovery. That way, our attorneys will be able to pursue all avenues for your financial compensation.


If you or someone you know has been injured by fault of someone else, it’s time to end the search for a Tulsa personal injury law firm.

Call today at (918) 409-7711.
